a0fef086-1698-4a26-8e40-117dce7b21c6:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"a0fef086-1698-4a26-8e40-117dce7b21c6","title":{"en":"I Love Persia!"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"ペルシャがすき！"},{"ja-ro":"Persia ga Suki!"},{"en":"Persia"}],"lastChapter":"9","description":{"en":"(from ebookjapan):\n\nA Lion Girl's Life in Japan Begins! \n\nA young girl who was raised by lions on the African prairie was taken into the custody of zoologist Dr. Yagami after the death of her parent lion. Named \"Persia,\" she is sent to live with Dr. Yagami, and She then began living with the doctor's twin sons at the doctor's family home in Japan... \n\nPersia is not used to this new life. \n\nThis is the first volume of the hilarious wild girl slapstick manga!\n\n-Addendum on the Anime Adaptation:\n\nPersia's anime adaptation was the second in Pierrot's Magical Girl series after Creamy Mami, and the only one to be an adaptation. The title was altered from *\"I Love Persia!\"* to  *\"Persia, the Magic Fairy\"* (Maho no Yousei Persia, 魔法の妖精 ペルシャ)\n\nBarring Persia's design, which was adapted very closely, and elements of the content from the early chapters being adapted, there is little resemblance to the manga in terms of story, characterization, themes and so forth. \n\nPersia herself in the original manga attempts to adjust to the new environment she finds herself in, connecting with her new family, and moving on from her old habits, which serves as the purpose for both the gags and the dramatic elements in the narrative. It can be said the Persia manga served as a potential influence for works like Kiyohiko Azuma's [Yotsuba\u0026!](https://mangadex.org/title/58be6aa6-06cb-4ca5-bd20-f1392ce451fb/yotsuba).\n\nIn the anime adaptation, Persia is made to be a magical girl, and is granted her abilities before she arrives in Japan. Her outfit from the manga is her appearance after she transforms. She is tasked with gathering Love Energy to sustain the Lovely Dream realm. \n\nWhile dramatic moments surrounding Persia, and her family and friends are present in the anime adaptation as well, they are deliberations by Studio Pierrot and not based on any of the manga's content. \n\nIn fact, many of the anime adaptations dramatic moments might draw more parallels with moments seen in Pierrot's preceding Creamy Mami.\n\nWhile the manga has neither been scanlated nor officially translated, the anime adaptation can be viewed on the streaming service RetroCrush, seen [here](https://www.retrocrush.tv/series/027533s/persia%2C-the-magic-fairy)"},"links":{"al":"39883","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B074CM6BKN?binding=kindle_edition\u0026searchxofy=true\u0026ref_=dbs_s_aps_series_rwt_tkin\u0026qid=1668208601\u0026sr=8-1","bw":"series/22886/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-168439","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/280200/A000444250/","kt":"persia-ga-suki","mal":"9883","mu":"ofecjn8"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

On the way home from a survey request, he protects a pair of twin girls who survived their caravan being attacked by bandits, however in this world twins are considered “abominations.”  Along with the twins and a girl who accompanies him as a follower, he holds back his anger at the world which looks coldly at the twin girls due to the goddess’ intervention.  \n  \nThis is the story of such a swordsman called the countless swords sorcerer.","es-la":"La magia de la espada, en la que se manipula una espada usando la magia para volar libremente por el aire, eliminando a los enemigos. Junto con las gemelas y una chica que le acompaña como seguidora, retiene su ira contra el mundo que mira fríamente a las gemelas debido a la intervención de la diosa. \n\nEsta es la historia de un espadachín llamado el incontable hechicero de las espadas.","fr":"L'épée magique, où une épée est manipulée en utilisant la magie pour voler librement dans les airs, en abattant les ennemis. Sur le chemin du retour après une demande d'enquête, il protège une paire de jumelles qui ont survécu à leur caravane attaquée par des bandits, mais dans ce monde les jumelles sont considérées comme des \"abominations\". Marida yang memiliki tubuh yang menarik dan pemikiran yang baik, akhirnya mereka bekerja sama, ia memanfaatkan pengetahuan modernnya untuk membuat prestasi besar dalam urusan rumah tangga, urusan militer, konspirasi, dll!?\r\n\r\n(MTL)","ja":"異世界に転生したアルベルトはアレクサ王国で安泰な生活を目指していた。しかし、地上最強生物で鮮血鬼と呼ばれる鬼人族の女性マリーダに攫われ、しかも襲撃の手引きをしたとして、王国から指名手配される。エランシア帝国でマリーダの婿として生きていくことを決めたアルベルトは、魅力的な肉体を持つマリーダとの夜の営みに励みつつ、現代知識を活かして、内政、軍事、謀略などで大きな功績を挙げる！？"},"links":{"al":"161499","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0BZSQPJ7M","ap":"isekai-saikyou-no-yome-desu-ga-yoru-no-tatakai-wa-ore-no-hou-ga-tsuyoi-you-desu-chiryaku-wo-ikashite-nariagaru-harem-senki","bw":"series/408392/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/759171/","kt":"isekai-saikyou-no-yome-desu-ga-yoru-no-tatakai-wa-ore-no-hou-ga-tsuyoi-you-desu-chiryaku-wo-ikashite-nariagaru-harem-senki-2023","mu":"atvxymw","raw":"https://gaugau.futabanet.jp/list/work/62c795387765610f03010000"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

Así es como se encuentra con un brujo, quien lo convertirá en humano a cambio de “otra cosa”.","pt":"O curioso príncipe do Reino das Sereias, Naru, viu uma garota humana, que se chama Nami. D. Roger, a man referred to as the \"Pirate King,\" is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  \n  \nTwenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.\n\n---\n\n**Note:**  \n**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!","uk":"Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.\r\n\r\nДвадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях."},"links":{"al":"30013","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B07CKFRZGW","ap":"one-piece","bw":"series/13002","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2439974","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/132082/","engtl":"https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100020","kt":"38","mal":"13","mu":"33","raw":"https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/10833519556325021794"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

Alone, cold and hungry, I lived on the streets until a kind couple took me in and I became Ethel, a commoner. Stella the princess was no more.\n\nNow, after 10 years, I have to return to the Imperial palace where I was abandoned, because my \"family\" wanted to see me.\n\n“I need a replacement,” my sister, the first princess, told me, “You'll replace my missing sister.”\n\nOf course, they don't even recognize that I am the real missing sister, since they never looked at me anyway.\n\n“That’s a tempting offer, but I don’t want it, princess.”\n\n“Are you sure you want to turn down my offer?”\n\nHer threat is so clear, but I might as well have my revenge and return the palace to play the role of my own substitute. I will humiliate these people who don’t recognize me, I will never forgive them. They'll try to win the heart of their princess who has awakened her powers, but this time I'll be the one to abandon them.\n\n“In the end, I’ll be happy.”\n\nThe splendid return of the abandoned princess.\n\n---\nWith the entire Belvice Empire awaiting her abilities, Princess Stella’s life is turned upside down when she fails to bring the stars into the sky. Discarded by her family as the empire is overthrown, she is taken in and raised by commoners. But when the empire is restored and her conceited sister finds her, Stella’s peaceful life is threatened once again. Is she doomed to live as a puppet for the family that hated her? Vou humilhar essas pessoas que não me reconhecem, nunca vou perdoá-las. a2480a74-181b-4631-b735-9c828efd6884:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"a2480a74-181b-4631-b735-9c828efd6884","title":{"en":"Watashi no Shounen"},"altTitles":[{"es":"Mi Niño"},{"en":"My Boy"},{"zh":"我的少年"},{"ja":"私の少年"},{"ko":"나의 소년"}],"lastChapter":"43","availableTranslatedLanguages":["es-la","en","pt-br"],"description":{"en":"Satoko Tawada is an office worker. She's almost 30 years old, but she still hasn't been able to find happiness in her life. Fate brings her with Mashu Hayami, a beautiful 12-year-old boy whom she finds practicing soccer all by himself in the park. Out of a whim, she decides to help Mashu with his practice, with her knowledge of soccer at her disposal. As they practice together on an everyday routine, the two eventually develop an emotional bond. When Satoko's ex-boyfriend deceives her, Mashu gladly comforts her. And when Satoko learns of Mashu's mostly absent parents, she starts to concern herself with his personal life. The two lonely souls find common ground and develop an emotional bond that transcends their age difference and circumstances. With this newfound bond, new feelings start to sprout within Satoko. Are these feelings that of maternity? Or is it something else?  \n  \nAwards:  \n- Ranked #11 in the 2017 Manga Taisho Awards  \n- Won 3rd place in the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Awards, Category Print Manga (2017)  \n- Won 2nd Place in the 2017 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! Awards for male readers  \n- Won 1st Place in the 2016 Oreman (俺マン) My Best Manga Gran Prix manga rankings.","pt-br":"Satoko Tawada é uma mulher de 30 anos que trabalha em uma companhia, mas ainda não conseguiu achar a felicidade em sua vida. O destino faz com que ela cruze caminhos com Mashuu Hayami, um belo garoto de 12 anos de idade que ela encontra treinando futebol. Em um impulso, ela decide o ajudar com seu treino. Enquanto praticam e criam uma rotina juntos, os dois criam laços emocionais um pelo outro, confortando e apoiando quando o outro precisa. Chocolate Cake  \nWhat does it mean when your husband suddenly buys a chocolate cake home on any other ordinary day?  \n  \n7. a2f9d3c4-5e32-46da-947a-ab5a87bd039b:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"a2f9d3c4-5e32-46da-947a-ab5a87bd039b","title":{"en":"Les Miserables (ARAI Takahiro)"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Les Misérables (ARAI Takahiro)"},{"en":"Sefiller"},{"ru":"Отверженные"},{"ja":"レ　ミゼラブル"},{"ja":"レ・ミゼラブル (新井隆広)"}],"lastChapter":"33","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","tr"],"description":{"en":"Based on the classic 'Les Misérables' by Victor Hugo.  \n  \nIntroducing one of the most famous characters in literature, Jean Valjean—the noble peasant imprisoned for stealing a loaf of bread—Les Misérables ranks among the greatest novels of all time. In it, Victor Hugo takes readers deep into the Parisian underworld, immerses them in a battle between good and evil, and carries them to the barricades during the uprising of 1832 with a breathtaking realism that is unsurpassed in modern prose. Within his dramatic story are themes that capture the intellect and the emotions: crime and punishment, the relentless persecution of Valjean by Inspector Javert, the desperation of the prostitute Fantine, the amorality of the rogue Thénardier, and the universal desire to escape the prisons of our own minds. Les Misérables gave Victor Hugo a canvas upon which he portrayed his criticism of the French political and judicial systems, but the portrait that resulted is larger than life, epic in scope—an extravagant spectacle that dazzles the senses even as it touches the heart.  \n  \n- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/pyonpyon6)"},"links":{"al":"87937","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/gp/product/B074CDKJDF","ap":"les-miserables","bw":"series/124577","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/234431/","engtl":"https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/les-miserables-omnibus/","kt":"14210","mal":"55301","mu":"101734"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

While the power of the physical part grew larger and larger, the mental part spread its energy throughout the planet into humans.\n\nNow, people using black magic are killing those with the spirit in them because as the mental part becomes weaker, the physical side becomes stronger, strong enough to destroy the planet. Elaine Beaulieu was one of those with the mental side inside her and when she was near death, the monkey spirit took over, trying to protect itself. Candid Amantini was sent from the Vatican as an exorcist specialist and learns the truth about the omnipotent ape monster. Ведь если душа такого человека ослабеет, увеличится физическая сила индивида и тот может уничтожить планету. The heroine who can now fangirl to her heart's content, and the Prince who doesn't know how to act around her. As they bicker back and forth, they start growing closer…\n\n---\nAngela is mortified when her cringey fanfic about the dethroned Prince Rayburn is published behind her back and becomes a wildly popular bestseller. Not only is it super embarrassing, but the book gets her in trouble with the current imperial family, who now want her head for treason!\n\nLuckily, Rayburn's sister Hoya offers to protect her-- but in exchange, she must write a sequel that will improve Rayburn's tarnished reputation. Despite being the president of a company, he devotes himself to his family detective business as a side job. His companions are Rokuta, a boy who works at his own pace, the stubborn Old Man Hyoroku, and his pet lion, Sanpei, three and one! They have an adventurous spirit, and in front of the members of the Kuruma Detective Agency, they can solve any difficult case. Even mysterious cases are resolved at full speed! Commentary on \"Good job! Hurray for Detective Chief!!'' Serialized in Shonen Gaho from 1964, \"Banzai Detective Chief'' is a detective action work by Hisashi Sekiya, is. At the time of the serialization, there were many works in the detective action genre, but Hisashi Sekiya tried to differentiate it from other works by bringing in his specialties of sitcoms and racing depictions. This work, \"Banzai Detective Chief'' is a remake of \"Banzai Detective Chief'', which was serialized in \"Weekly Shonen Magazine'' in 1963. You can see the author's passion for this work because it was remade in a short period of time (about half a year), which is unprecedented in the history of manga, and the illustrations have been rewritten while keeping the story the same!? In addition to recording all the stories of \"Shonen Gaho'', it also includes the short story \"Erase at the Grand Prix'' that was published in \"Weekly Shonen King'' in 1968, making it a [complete version].
